title: Advanced Mathematics Concept Project Utilizing Learner-Generated Comics

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Project-based learning where learners independently visualize and explain mathematical concepts using comic creation tools on digital devices (tablets/laptops)

learning_goals: Learners can visualize and express complex mathematical concepts in learning-generated comics with five or more panels.
Learners can verify the accuracy (over 80%) of comic content through peer assessment and feedback systems.
Learners can create a 10-minute concept explanation presentation using generated comics
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
